snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS | Countdown to Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS is launching on September 7, 2023!
Check out the latest trailer!

Pre-Register Now: https://en.ffviiec.com/pre-registration/

The latest installment in the legendary FINAL FANTASY VII RPG Series. Relive the most memorable moments from FFVII and experience the journey of a young hero Sephiroth.

Experience both classic and new stories within the FFVII universe presented in a retro-style look combined with modern, beautifully rendered graphics, that’s easily accessible on the go. Team up your favorite characters and customize each one with iconic gear and weapons to defeat powerful opponents in Solo or Co-op battle mode. 

Latest Info: 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official site: https://en.ffviiec.com/ 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/FFVII_EC_EN 
FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FinalFantasyVIIEC

Summary: 
TITLE: FINAL FANTASY VII EVER CRISIS 
GENRE: RPG
PLATFORM: iOS／Android
PRICE: Free-to-play (With in-app purchases)

© SQUARE ENIX Powered by Applibot, Inc.
CHARACTER DESIGN: TETSUYA NOMURA / CHARACTER ILLUSTRATION: LISA FUJISE

#FF7EC #FF7EverCrisis #FF7 #FFVII
